greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerators of row sums of array of ratios A111879(n,k)/A111880(n,k).
comment: The denominators are given in A069220(n), n>=3.
formula: a(n)= numerator(sum(r(n, k), k=1..phi(n)-1), with phi(n):=A000010(n) (Euler's totient function) and the ratios r(n, k):=A111879(n, k)/A111880(n, k).
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Aug 23 2005
